snippet: Continuing to maintain that he had been set up by Government prosecutors bent on imprisoning black officeholders, former Representative Walter R. Tucker 3d was sentenced on Wednesday to 27 months in prison for extortion and income tax fraud.      ...
lead_paragraph: Continuing to maintain that he had been set up by Government prosecutors bent on imprisoning black officeholders, former Representative Walter R. Tucker 3d was sentenced on Wednesday to 27 months in prison for extortion and income tax fraud. "I did not get into politics to line my pockets," Mr. Tucker told the court before sentencing. "The truth of the matter is it was a setup from the beginning."

headline.main: Ex-Rep. Tucker Draws Prison For Extortion

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: TUCKER, WALTER R 3D WALTER R TUCKER III
